statements: SELECT * FROM microbial_strains WHERE species = 'E. coli'
SELECT strain_name, species FROM microbial_strains WHERE origin_country = 'USA'
SELECT strain_id, isolation_source FROM microbial_strains WHERE species = 'Bacillus subtilis'
SELECT * FROM microbial_strains ORDER BY strain_name ASC
SELECT strain_id, strain_name, species, origin_country FROM microbial_strains WHERE isolation_source = 'soil'
SELECT * FROM microbial_strains WHERE species='E. coli' ORDER BY strain_name ASC;
SELECT strain_id, strain_name, species FROM microbial_strains WHERE origin_country='USA';
SELECT * FROM microbial_strains WHERE growth_conditions LIKE '%agar%' ORDER BY strain_id DESC;
SELECT strain_id, strain_name, origin_country FROM microbial_strains WHERE isolation_source='soil' OR isolation_source='water';
SELECT * FROM microbial_strains WHERE species='Streptococcus' AND (origin_country='Canada' OR origin_country='France');
SELECT * FROM microbial_strains;
SELECT strain_id, strain_name FROM microbial_strains WHERE isolation_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM microbial_strains WHERE source_country = 'USA' AND characteristics->>'pathogenicity' = 'high';
SELECT strain_id, morphology, resistance FROM strain_characteristics WHERE growth_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY strain_id DESC;
SELECT strain_name, isolation_date, characteristics->>'virulence_factor' AS virulence FROM microbial_strains WHERE source_country = 'Canada';
SELECT * FROM microbial_strains WHERE strain_id = 1;
SELECT strain_name, isolation_date FROM microbial_strains WHERE source_country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM microbial_strains ORDER BY isolation_date DESC;
SELECT strain_name, growth_rate FROM microbial_strains JOIN strain_characteristics ON microbial_strains.strain_id = strain_characteristics.strain_id;
SELECT * FROM microbial_strains WHERE characteristics ->> 'temperature' = '25°C';
SELECT * FROM microbial_strains;
SELECT strain_name, genus, species FROM microbial_strains WHERE genus='Bacillus';
SELECT strain_name, isolation_date FROM microbial_strains ORDER BY isolation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM strain_characteristics WHERE characteristic_name='Antibiotic Resistance';
SELECT project_title, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE lead_researcher='Dr. Smith';
SELECT * FROM microbial_strains;
SELECT strain_name, genus, species FROM microbial_strains WHERE genus='Bacillus';
SELECT strain_name, characteristic_name, characteristic_value FROM microbial_strains JOIN strain_characteristics ON microbial_strains.strain_id=strain_characteristics.strain_id;
SELECT project_title, lead_researcher FROM research_projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY project_title DESC;
SELECT * FROM microbial_strains WHERE isolation_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY isolation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM microbial_strains;
SELECT name, species FROM microbial_strains WHERE id = 1;
SELECT strain_id, growth_rate, temperature FROM microbial_characteristics WHERE strain_id = 2;
SELECT lab_name, location FROM research_labs WHERE researcher_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT id, strain_id, experiment_date FROM experiments ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM microbial_strains;
SELECT id, name, species FROM microbial_strains ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, species, description FROM microbial_strains WHERE species='Bacteria';
SELECT * FROM microbial_characteristics WHERE growth_rate > 0.5 AND temperature >= 30;
SELECT lab_name, researcher_name, location FROM research_labs WHERE researcher_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM strains;
SELECT name, species, origin FROM strains WHERE species = 'sativa';
SELECT id, location_name, country FROM locations ORDER BY country DESC;
SELECT researches.researcher_name, researches.duration, strains.name FROM researches JOIN strains ON researches.strain_id = strains.id;
SELECT * FROM measurements WHERE value > 5 AND unit = 'g/L';
SELECT * FROM strains;
SELECT id, name, origin FROM strains WHERE species='Indica';
SELECT researcher_name, start_date, duration, species FROM researches JOIN strains ON researches.strain_id = strains.id;
SELECT location_name, country, region FROM locations ORDER BY country DESC;
SELECT c.id, c.growth_rate, m.value, m.unit FROM characteristics c JOIN measurements m ON c.id = m.characteristic_id WHERE c.temperature > 25;
